title: I broke Zac
body: last night i was playing a custom game with a few friends and this is what happens when {{champion:154}} and {{champion:117}} are combinded with HP and her alt and also a few {{item:3083}}

replies.body: That didn't break the game. Zac + ascension + 6 warmogs broke zac. He was so big to the point where lulu ult would not do anything.
the point was we found it very funny and amusing.

Only thing I learnt from that video is that you and your friends laugh way too easily.

Seriously, it's not that funny.

This has never been done before in the history of DotA.
jk
